content.rendered:
We won the Deloitte Fast 50 award for the fastest-growing company in Central and Eastern Europe, and we are looking for new colleagues to help us take our project further! Seize the opportunity and become part of the rapidly growing startup FTMO.com. We are looking for a new colleague to join our marketing department. The ideal candidate has experience in UI design and has been working in this field for 4-5 years with a strong portfolio.

Do you enjoy design systems and the world of UI? Do you think about it day and night? Do you want to work with worldwide audience? Then you’re exactly who we are looking for. 😉

What will be your agenda?

  • Providing user-centric design solutions for all our products – mobile and desktop versions of the applications, website, and features within FTMO.
  • Contributing to the development and maintenance of design systems, guidelines, patterns, creating design libraries and style guides.
  • Strengthening the design maturity of the entire company and maintaining visual consistency of design across all products.

What are we expecting from you?

  • Experience with Figma and Adobe Suite (Photoshop, Illustrator).
  • UI library – UI design system
  • Digital illustration (vector graphics)
  • Proficiency in basic design principles, processes, and typography. Experience in component creation, design systems, or style guides is also appreciated.
  • Ability to organize time, meet deadlines, and see a project through to completion.

And why work for us?

  • You will be working for a fast-growing start-up/fintech, where you will find 150+ motivated people. We’re rather friends than colleagues and we share the same goals.
  • We encourage self-realisation, we’re flexible and open to new ideas. Each of us can influence the project while working on ourselves and move professionally forward.
  • Thanks our working pace, we can assure you that you won’t get bored with us.
  • We will train you on financial markets and all the other related topics so you know our business.
  • Working from home is not a problem (it always depends on the agreement), but we prefer to work in the office – Quadrio offices will make you feel like at home as well.
  • Free snacks and refreshments (both healthy and sweet) are available for everyone in the office.
  • We’ll offer you a Multisport card, feel free to join our FTMO Running club!
  • Providing appropriate HW goes without saying (laptop, 2 monitors, adjustable desk, ergonomic chair). We want to make sure you’ll feel comfortable in our Quadrio offices.
  • Meeting room for poker and board games. Or you can sing karaoke with us.

Did we catch your attention? Let us know!
Send us ➡️ your CV or LinkedIn profile and we’ll gladly meet you, regardless whether in person or online.
